title: What is the name of a song or artist? - Quora

response.answer_text: Era- 2016 to 2018, Genre- Pop, Artist type- Female singer The song was a pop song, composed by someone like Kygo, or Tïesto. It was featuring a woman who in an interview once said she was a lesbian but didn’t identify within in the LGBTQ+ community. It was popular in the recent years, like 2016 or 2018. She had long blonde hair. I’m desperate rn The lyrics pertained to the night with her lover.
